Name: Insect War
About the game: Finally, the very ladybug who is ready to avenge the blood of her fellow human beings has been found. Having convinced one spider, he takes power in the spider's lair into his own hands. Destroying everyone one by one, he will achieve his goal! Insect Wars is a Top Down Shooter genre game that includes both scroll shooter genre maps and locations in the 'tower defense' genre, so it will definitely not leave you indifferent. Show all the rage and agility by destroying all the spiders in your path. In the end, having taken the spider lair, you will have to defend it alone from the invasion of the spider horde. Features of the game: - Complexity - Pixel-Art - Convenient Operation
